sentence.Network_en: Originally Jujutsu was the method of unarmed combat of the Ancient Samurai.
sentence.Network_cn: 原本柔术是古代日本武士在手无寸铁时的格斗用法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(J) ... jujube 枣 jujutsu 柔术 juke 诱使.

list.abs: Brazilian jujutsu master Rorion Gracie agrees : " More important than doing the move fast is to focus on doing the move right at slow speed many times . "巴西柔术大师荷利安。格雷西赞同下述观点：“比快速完成动作更重要的是，多次以较慢的动作正确完成动作。

Brazilian jujutsu master Rorion Gracie agrees : " More important than doing the move fast is to focus on doing the move right at slow speed many times . "巴西柔术大师荷利安。格雷西赞同下述观点：“比快速完成动作更重要的是，多次以较慢的动作正确完成动作。

means.word_mean: 1. a method of self-defense without weapons that was developed in China and Japan; holds and blows are supplemented by clever use of the attacker's own weight and strength
